p: We found a small number of SNPs per sample varying from 16 to 21 (b_29L and e_45SR = 16 SNPs, c_29SR = 29 and d_45PL and f_45FL = 21 SNPs). 71 out of 93 SNPs found are synonymous, 21 are non-synonymous and one generate a stop codon ( Fig 2). Interestingly, 41 of all 93 SNPs detected are minor variants, that are supported by a substantial amount of reads but in a lower proportion compared with the reference nucleotide ( S2 Fig). Eight of these correspond to non-synonymous changes.
